member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.ActivityTriggerAttribute
member.summary: Trigger attribute used for durable activity functions.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.ActivityTriggerAttribute.Activity
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the activity function.
member.value: The name of the activity function or null to use the function name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.ActivityTriggerAttribute.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the activity function.
member.value: The version of the activity function.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension
member.summary: Configuration for the Durable Functions extension.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.DefaultHubName
member.summary: The default task hub name to use when not explicitly configured.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.HubName
member.summary: Gets or sets default task hub name to be used by all , , and instances.
member.remarks: A task hub is a logical grouping of storage resources. Alternate task hub names can be used to isolate multiple Durable Functions applications from each other, even if they are using the same storage backend.
member.value: The name of the default task hub.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.ControlQueueBatchSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of messages to pull from the control queue at a time.
member.value: A positive integer configured by the host. The default value is 20.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.PartitionCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the partition count for the control queue.
member.value: A positive integer between 1 and 16. The default value is 4.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.ControlQueueVisibilityTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the visibility timeout of dequeued control queue messages.
member.value: A TimeSpan configured by the host. The default is 5 minutes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.WorkItemQueueVisibilityTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the visibility timeout of dequeued work item queue messages.
member.value: A TimeSpan configured by the host. The default is 5 minutes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.MaxConcurrentTaskActivityWorkItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of work items that can be processed concurrently on a single node.
member.value: A positive integer configured by the host. The default value is 10.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.MaxConcurrentTaskOrchestrationWorkItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of orchestrations that can be processed concurrently on a single node.
member.value: A positive integer configured by the host. The default value is 100.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.AzureStorageConnectionStringName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the Azure Storage connection string used to manage the underlying Azure Storage resources.
member.remarks: If not specified, the default behavior is to use the standard `AzureWebJobsStorage` connection string for all storage usage.
member.value: The name of a connection string that exists in the app's application settings.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.NotificationUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the notification URL for polling status of instances.
member.value: A URL pointing to the hosted function app that responds to status polling requests.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.TraceInputsAndOutputs
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to trace the inputs and outputs of function calls.
member.remarks: The default behavior when tracing function execution events is to include the number of bytes in the serialized inputs and outputs for function calls. This provides minimal information about what the inputs and outputs look like without bloating the logs or inadvertently exposing sensitive information to the logs. Setting to true will instead cause the default function logging to log the entire contents of function inputs and outputs.
member.value: true to trace the raw values of inputs and outputs; otherwise false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.DisableHttpManagementApis
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to expose HTTP APIs for managing orchestration instances.
member.remarks: Orchestration instances can be managed using HTTP APIs implemented by the Durable Functions extension. This includes checking status, raising events, and terminating instances. These APIs do not require any authentication and therefore the instance IDs for these URLs should not be shared externally. These APIs are enabled by default but can be disabled by setting this property to true.
member.value: true to disable the instance management HTTP APIs; otherwise false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.DisableStartInstancePolling
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which controls whether the polling behavior of is disabled.
member.remarks: This is a temporary setting and will be removed in future versions.
member.value: true to disable polling; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Extensions.DurableTask.DurableTaskExtension.Microsoft#Azure#WebJobs#Host#Config#IExtensionConfigProvider#Initialize(Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.Host.Config.ExtensionConfigContext)
member.summary: Internal initialization call from the WebJobs host.
member.param: Extension context provided by WebJobs.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableActivityContext
member.summary: Parameter data for activity bindings that are scheduled by their parent orchestrations.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableActivityContext.InstanceId
member.summary: Gets the instance ID of the currently executing orchestration.
member.remarks: The instance ID is generated and fixed when the parent orchestrator function is scheduled. It can be either auto-generated, in which case it is formatted as a GUID, or it can be user-specified with any format.
member.value: The ID of the current orchestration instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableActivityContext.GetRawInput
member.summary: Returns the input of the task activity in its raw JSON string value.
member.returns: The raw JSON-formatted activity input as a string value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableActivityContext.GetInputAsJson
member.summary: Gets the input of the current activity function instance as a JToken.
member.returns: The parsed JToken representation of the activity input.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableActivityContext.GetInput``1
member.summary: Gets the input of the current activity function as a deserialized value.
member.typeparam: Any data contract type that matches the JSON input.
member.returns: The deserialized input value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableActivityContext.SetOutput(System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the JSON-serializeable output of the activity function.
member.remarks: If this method is not called explicitly, the return value of the activity function is used as the output.
member.param: The JSON-serializeable value to use as the activity function output.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationClient
member.summary: Client for starting, querying, terminating, and raising events to new or existing orchestration instances.

member.summary: Abstract class for

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationClientBase.CreateCheckStatusResponse(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an HTTP response for checking the status of the specified instance.
member.param: The HTTP request that triggered the current function.
The unique ID of the instance to check.
member.returns: An HTTP response which may include a 202 and location header.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationClientBase.WaitForCompletionOrCreateCheckStatusResponseAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Creates an HTTP response for checking the status of the specified instance supporting synchronous response as well.
member.param: The HTTP request that triggered the current function.
The unique ID of the instance to check.
Total allowed timeout for output from the durable function. The default value is 10 seconds.
The timeout between checks for output from the durable function. The default value is 1 second.
member.returns: An HTTP response which may include a 202 and location header or a 200 with the durable function output in the response body.

JSON-serializeable input value for the orchestrator function.
member.returns: A task that completes when the orchestration is started.
member.exception: The specified function does not exist, is disabled, or is not an orchestrator function.

A unique ID to use for the new orchestration instance.
JSON-serializeable input value for the orchestrator function.
member.returns: A task that completes when the orchestration is started.

The name of the event.
The JSON-serializeable data associated with the event.

member.summary: Terminates a running orchestration instance.

The reason for terminating the orchestration instance.

member.summary: Gets the status of the specified orchestration instance.

Boolean marker for including execution history in the response.

member.returns: Returns a task which completes when the status has been fetched.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContext
member.summary: Parameter data for orchestration bindings that can be used to schedule function-based activities.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContext.GetRawInput
member.summary: Returns the orchestrator function input as a raw JSON string value.
member.returns: The raw JSON-formatted orchestrator function input.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContext.GetInputAsJson
member.summary: Gets the input of the current orchestrator function instance as a JToken.
member.returns: The parsed JToken representation of the orchestrator function input.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContext.SetOutput(System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the JSON-serializeable output of the current orchestrator function.
member.remarks: If this method is not called explicitly, the return value of the orchestrator function is used as the output.
member.param: The JSON-serializeable value to use as the orchestrator function output.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContextBase
member.summary: Abstract class for

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContextBase.InstanceId
member.summary: Gets the instance ID of the currently executing orchestration.
member.remarks: The instance ID is generated and fixed when the orchestrator function is scheduled. It can be either auto-generated, in which case it is formatted as a GUID, or it can be user-specified with any format.
member.value: The ID of the current orchestration instance.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContextBase.CurrentUtcDateTime
member.summary: Gets the current date/time in a way that is safe for use by orchestrator functions.
member.remarks: This date/time value is derived from the orchestration history. It always returns the same value at specific points in the orchestrator function code, making it deterministic and safe for replay.
member.value: The orchestration's current date/time in UTC.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContextBase.IsReplaying
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the orchestrator function is currently replaying itself.
member.remarks: This property is useful when there is logic that needs to run only when the orchestrator function is *not* replaying. For example, certain types of application logging may become too noisy when duplicated as part of orchestrator function replay. The orchestrator code could check to see whether the function is being replayed and then issue the log statements when this value is false.
member.value: true if the orchestrator function is currently being replayed; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContextBase.GetInput``1
member.summary: Gets the input of the current orchestrator function as a deserialized value.
member.typeparam: Any data contract type that matches the JSON input.
member.returns: The deserialized input value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContextBase.CallActivityAsync(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Schedules an activity function named for execution.
member.param: The name of the activity function to call.
The JSON-serializeable input to pass to the activity function.
member.returns: A durable task that completes when the called function completes or fails.
member.exception: The specified function does not exist, is disabled, or is not an orchestrator function.
The current thread is different than the thread which started the orchestrator execution.
The activity function failed with an unhandled exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContextBase.CreateTimer(System.DateTime,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a durable timer which expires at a specified time.
member.remarks: All durable timers created using this method must either expire or be cancelled using the before the orchestrator function completes. Otherwise the underlying framework will keep the instance alive until the timer expires.
member.param: The time at which the timer should expire.
The CancellationToken to use for cancelling the timer.
member.returns: A durable task that completes when the durable timer expires.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContextBase.CreateTimer``1(System.DateTime,``0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a durable timer which expires at a specified time.
member.remarks: All durable timers created using this method must either expire or be cancelled using the before the orchestrator function completes. Otherwise the underlying framework will keep the instance alive until the timer expires.
member.param: The time at which the timer should expire.
Any state to be preserved by the timer.
The CancellationToken to use for cancelling the timer.
member.returns: A durable task that completes when the durable timer expires.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContextBase.WaitForExternalEvent``1(System.String)
member.summary: Waits asynchronously for an event to be raised with name and returns the event data.
member.param: The name of the event to wait for.
member.typeparam: Any serializeable type that represents the JSON event payload.
member.returns: A durable task that completes when the external event is received.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationContextBase.ContinueAsNew(System.Object)
member.summary: Restarts the orchestration and its history.
member.param: The JSON-serializeable data to re-initialize the instance with.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationStatus
member.summary: Represents the status of a durable orchestration instance.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationStatus.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the queried orchestrator function.
member.value: The orchestrator function name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationStatus.InstanceId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the queried orchestration instance.
member.remarks: The instance ID is generated and fixed when the orchestrator function is scheduled. It can be either auto-generated, in which case it is formatted as a GUID, or it can be user-specified with any format.
member.value: The ID of the queried instance.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationStatus.CreatedTime
member.summary: Gets the time at which the queried orchestration instance was created.
member.value: The creation time in UTC.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationStatus.LastUpdatedTime
member.summary: Gets the time at which the queried orchestration instance last updated its execution history.
member.value: The last-updated time in UTC.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationStatus.Input
member.summary: Gets the input of the queried orchestrator function instance.
member.value: The input as a JToken or null if no input was provided.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationStatus.Output
member.summary: Gets the output of the queried orchestration instance.
member.value: The output as a JToken object or null if it has not yet completed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationStatus.RuntimeStatus
member.summary: Gets the runtime status of the queried orchestration instance.
member.value: Expected values include `Running`, `Pending`, `Failed`, `Canceled`, `Terminated`, `Completed`.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.DurableOrchestrationStatus.History
member.summary: Gets the execution history of the queried orchestrator function instance.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationClientAttribute
member.summary: Attribute used to bind a function parameter to a Durable Functions client object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationClientAttribute.TaskHub
member.summary: Optional. Gets or sets the name of the task hub to be operated on.
member.value: The task hub used by this binding.
member.remarks: The default behavior is to use the task hub name specified in . If no value exists there, then a default value will be used.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationClientAttribute.ConnectionName
member.summary: Optional. Gets or sets the name of the Azure Storage connection string used by this binding.
member.value: The name of a connection string that exists in the app's application settings.
member.remarks: The default behavior is to use the value specified in . If no value exists there, then the default behavior is to use the standard `AzureWebJobsStorage` connection string for all storage usage.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationClientAttribute.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for this attribute.
member.returns: A hash code for this attribute.

member.summary: Compares two instances for value equality.
member.param: The object to compare with.
member.returns: true if the two attributes have the same configuration; otherwise false.

member.summary: Compares two instances for value equality.
member.param: The object to compare with.
member.returns: true if the two attributes have the same configuration; otherwise false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationRuntimeStatus
member.summary: Represents the possible runtime execution status values for an orchestration instance.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationRuntimeStatus.Running
member.summary: The orchestration is running (it may be actively running or waiting for input).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationRuntimeStatus.Completed
member.summary: The orchestration ran to completion.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationRuntimeStatus.ContinuedAsNew
member.summary: The orchestration completed with ContinueAsNew as is in the process of restarting.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationRuntimeStatus.Failed
member.summary: The orchestration failed with an error.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationRuntimeStatus.Canceled
member.summary: The orchestration was gracefully canceled.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationRuntimeStatus.Terminated
member.summary: The orchestration was abruptly terminated via an API call.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationRuntimeStatus.Pending
member.summary: The orchestration was scheduled but is not yet active.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationTriggerAttribute
member.summary: Trigger attribute used for durable orchestrator functions.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationTriggerAttribute.Orchestration
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the orchestrator function.
member.value: The name of the orchestrator function or null to use the function name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.OrchestrationTriggerAttribute.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the orchestrator function.
member.value: The version of the orchestrator function.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.RetryOptions
member.summary: Contains retry policies that can be passed as parameters to various operations

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.RetryOptions.#ctor(System.TimeSpan,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance RetryOptions with the supplied first retry and max attempts
member.param: Timespan to wait for the first retry
Max number of attempts to retry
member.exception: The TimeSpan value must be greater than TimeSpan.Zero.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.RetryOptions.FirstRetryInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the first retry interval
member.value: The TimeSpan to wait for the first retries

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.RetryOptions.MaxRetryInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the max retry interval
member.value: The TimeSpan of the max retry interval, defaults to TimeSpan.MaxValue

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.RetryOptions.BackoffCoefficient
member.summary: Gets or sets the backoff coefficient
member.value: The backoff coefficient used to determine rate of increase of backoff, defaults to 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.RetryOptions.RetryTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for retries
member.value: The TimeSpan timeout for retries, defaults to TimeSpan.MaxValue

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.RetryOptions.MaxNumberOfAttempts
member.summary: Gets or sets the max number of attempts
member.value: The maximum number of retry attempts

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.RetryOptions.Handle
member.summary: Gets or sets a Func to call on exception to determine if retries should proceed
member.value: The Func to handle exception to determie if retries should proceed

member.summary: Parameters for starting a new instance of an orchestration.
member.remarks: This class is primarily intended for use with IAsyncCollector<T>.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the orchestrator function to start.
The JSON-serializeable input for the orchestrator function.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.StartOrchestrationArgs.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.StartOrchestrationArgs.FunctionName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the orchestrator function to start.
member.value: The name of the orchestrator function to start.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.WebJobs.StartOrchestrationArgs.InstanceId
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance ID to assign to the started orchestration.
member.remarks: If this property value is null (the default), then a randomly generated instance ID will be assigned automatically.
member.value: The instance ID to assign.
